name: The People's Front 1926
description:
The People's Front 1926 is intended to be a Multiplayer PVP 3rd Person Shooter.

This demo allows player to try the weaponry, has a detailed map to explore and some other features such as point capturing.

The game’s premise is based on the 1926 General strike that took place across the Britain. 

As opposed to the real turn of events, in this universe the strike turns into a violent revolution with the Socialist Revolutionaries fighting the Monarchists. 

Workers in Northern England, Wales and East London rise up to fight the establishment.

Explore the map and try the controls/weapons, hopefully I will be able to implement the missing features and make this game go live as multiplayer.

Made solo for Portfolio module for UEL Submission.

Have fun!
